import React from 'react'; import { LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, BarChart, Bar } from 'recharts'; import { revenueData, mockUsers, products } from '../data/mockData'; const Dashboard = () => { const stats = [ { title: 'Total Users', value: mockUsers.length, change: '+12%', icon: 'ðŸ‘¥', type: 'primary' }, { title: 'Total Products', value: products.length, change: '+5%', icon: 'ðŸ“¦', type: 'success' }, { title: 'Monthly Revenue', value: '$12,458', change: '+8%', icon: 'ðŸ’°', type: 'warning' }, { title: 'Active Sessions', value: '1,234', change: '-2%', icon: 'ðŸ”—', type: 'danger' } ]; return (

Dashboard Overview

{/* Stats Grid */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.icon}

{stat.value}

{stat.title}

{stat.change} from last month
))}

{/* Recent Users */}

Name Email Role Status Last Login
{user.name} {user.email} {user.role} {user.status} {user.lastLogin}
); }; export default Dashboard;
